title: How to land a job in UX design in 2022 — even if you don’t have experience
content:
Are you considering a career move in 2022? The last two years have made us all reevaluate what we want from our jobs. Perhaps it’s time to try something new, reskill, or pivot into a different field. One role that is constantly in high demand is UX design. If you think you’d be a good fit for this job you probably have a lot of questions in the back of your mind like, is the UX market still booming in 2022? Do I have the necessary skills to break into this field or how can I be successful? Don’t worry!…

description: UX design is one of the most in demand jobs today. But what exactly is UX design and what skills do you need to do the job right?
